java/liquibase/servlet/LiquibaseServletListener.java

00001 package liquibase.servlet;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00004 import liquibase.*;
00005 import liquibase.database.DatabaseFactory;
00006 
00007 import javax.servlet.ServletContextListener;
00008 import javax.servlet.ServletContextEvent;
00009 import javax.naming.Context;
00010 import javax.naming.InitialContext;
00011 import javax.sql.DataSource;
00012 import java.util.logging.Handler;
00013 import java.util.logging.LogRecord;
00014 import java.net.InetAddress;
00015 import java.net.UnknownHostException;
00016 import java.sql.Connection;
00017 
00025 public class LiquibaseServletListener implements ServletContextListener {
00026 
00027     private String changeLogFile;
00028     private String dataSource;
00029     private String contexts;
00030 
00031 
00032     public String getChangeLogFile() {
00033         return changeLogFile;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void setContexts(String ctxt) {
00037         contexts = ctxt;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getContexts() {
00041         return contexts;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setChangeLogFile(String changeLogFile) {
00045         this.changeLogFile = changeLogFile;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getDataSource() {
00049         return dataSource;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setDataSource(String dataSource) {
00053         this.dataSource = dataSource;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
00057         LogFactory.getLogger().addHandler(new Handler() {
00058             public synchronized void publish(LogRecord record) {
00059                 LiquibaseStatusServlet.logMessage(record);
00060             }
00061 
00062             public void flush() {
00063             }
00064 
00065             public void close() throws SecurityException {
00066             }
00067         });
00068         String hostName;
00069         try {
00070             hostName = InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName();
00071         } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
00072             servletContextEvent.getServletContext().log("Cannot find hostname: " + e.getMessage());
00073             return;
00074         }
00075 
00076         String shouldRunProperty = System.getProperty(Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY);
00077         if (shouldRunProperty != null && !Boolean.valueOf(shouldRunProperty)) {
00078             LogFactory.getLogger().info("LiquiBase did not run on " + hostName + " because '" + Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY + "' system property was set to false");
00079             return;
00080         }
00081 
00082         String machineIncludes = servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_HOST_INCLUDES");
00083         String machineExcludes = servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_HOST_EXCLUDES");
00084         String failOnError = servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_FAIL_ON_ERROR");
00085 
00086         boolean shouldRun = false;
00087         if (machineIncludes == null && machineExcludes == null) {
00088             shouldRun = true;
00089         } else if (machineIncludes != null) {
00090             for (String machine : machineIncludes.split(",")) {
00091                 machine = machine.trim();
00092                 if (hostName.equalsIgnoreCase(machine)) {
00093                     shouldRun = true;
00094                 }
00095             }
00096         } else if (machineExcludes != null) {
00097             shouldRun = true;
00098             for (String machine : machineExcludes.split(",")) {
00099                 machine = machine.trim();
00100                 if (hostName.equalsIgnoreCase(machine)) {
00101                     shouldRun = false;
00102                 }
00103             }
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (!shouldRun) {
00107             servletContextEvent.getServletContext().log("LiquibaseServletListener did not run due to LIQUIBASE_HOST_INCLUDES and/or LIQUIBASE_HOST_EXCLUDES");
00108             return;
00109         }
00110 
00111 
00112         setDataSource(servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_DATA_SOURCE"));
00113         setChangeLogFile(servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_CHANGELOG"));
00114         setContexts(servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_CONTEXTS"));
00115         if (getChangeLogFile() == null) {
00116             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot run LiquiBase, LIQUIBASE_CHANGELOG is not set");
00117         }
00118         if (getDataSource() == null) {
00119             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot run LiquiBase, LIQUIBASE_DATA_SOURCE is not set");
00120         }
00121 
00122         try {
00123             Context ic = null;
00124             Connection connection = null;
00125             try {
00126                 ic = new InitialContext();
00127                 DataSource dataSource = (DataSource) ic.lookup(this.dataSource);
00128 
00129                 connection = dataSource.getConnection();
00130 
00131                 FileOpener clFO = new ClassLoaderFileOpener();
00132                 FileOpener fsFO = new FileSystemFileOpener();
00133 
00134 
00135                 Liquibase liquibase = new Liquibase(getChangeLogFile(), new CompositeFileOpener(clFO,fsFO), DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection));
00136                 liquibase.update(getContexts());
00137             } finally {
00138                 if (ic != null) {
00139                     ic.close();
00140                 }
00141                 if (connection != null) {
00142                     connection.close();
00143                     connection.close();
00144                 }
00145             }
00146 
00147         } catch (Exception e) {
00148             if (!"false".equals(failOnError)) {
00149                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00150             }
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154     public void contextDestroyed(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
00155     }
00156 
00157 }
